metadata.title: Rick Astley - Never Gonna Give You Up (Official Video) (4K Remaster)
metadata.description:
The official video for “Never Gonna Give You Up” by Rick Astley. 

Never: The Autobiography 📚 OUT NOW! 
Follow this link to get your copy and listen to Rick’s ‘Never’ playlist ❤️ #RickAstleyNever
https://linktr.ee/rickastleynever

“Never Gonna Give You Up” was a global smash on its release in July 1987, topping the charts in 25 countries including Rick’s native UK and the US Billboard Hot 100.  It also won the Brit Award for Best single in 1988. Stock Aitken and Waterman wrote and produced the track which was the lead-off single and lead track from Rick’s debut LP “Whenever You Need Somebody”.  The album was itself a UK number one and would go on to sell over 15 million copies worldwide.

The legendary video was directed by Simon West – who later went on to make Hollywood blockbusters such as Con Air, Lara Croft – Tomb Raider and The Expendables 2.  The video passed the 1bn YouTube views milestone on 28 July 2021.

Subscribe to the official Rick Astley YouTube channel: https://RickAstley.lnk.to/YTSubID

Follow Rick Astley:
Facebook: https://RickAstley.lnk.to/FBFollowID 
Twitter: https://RickAstley.lnk.to/TwitterID 
Instagram: https://RickAstley.lnk.to/InstagramID 
Website: https://RickAstley.lnk.to/storeID 
TikTok: https://RickAstley.lnk.to/TikTokID

Listen to Rick Astley:
Spotify: https://RickAstley.lnk.to/SpotifyID 
Apple Music: https://RickAstley.lnk.to/AppleMusicID 
Amazon Music: https://RickAstley.lnk.to/AmazonMusicID 
Deezer: https://RickAstley.lnk.to/DeezerID 

Lyrics:
We’re no strangers to love
You know the rules and so do I
A full commitment’s what I’m thinking of
You wouldn’t get this from any other guy

I just wanna tell you how I’m feeling
Gotta make you understand

Never gonna give you up
Never gonna let you down
Never gonna run around and desert you
Never gonna make you cry
Never gonna say goodbye
Never gonna tell a lie and hurt you

We’ve known each other for so long
Your heart’s been aching but you’re too shy to say it
Inside we both know what’s been going on
We know the game and we’re gonna play it

And if you ask me how I’m feeling
Don’t tell me you’re too blind to see

Never gonna give you up
Never gonna let you down
Never gonna run around and desert you
Never gonna make you cry
Never gonna say goodbye
Never gonna tell a lie and hurt you

#RickAstley #NeverGonnaGiveYouUp #WheneverYouNeedSomebody #OfficialMusicVideo
tags: never gonna give you up lyrics
fortnite never gonna give you up
never gonna give u up lyrics
never gonna give you up karaoke

transcript.full_text:
Of course. Here is the complete transcription of the video with the requested temporal analysis.

**COMPLETE TRANSCRIPTION**

**[00:00-00:18] [MUSIC]**
[VISUAL: The video opens with a close-up of singer Rick Astley. It cuts between him singing into a vintage microphone in a well-lit room with a patterned window behind him, dancing in front of a chain-link fence in a denim outfit during the daytime, and singing in a trench coat in a brick archway at night. A blonde woman is also shown dancing.]

**00:18-00:22**
We're no strangers to love.
[VISUAL: Rick Astley sings while wearing a trench coat over a black turtleneck, standing in an alley with brick archways at night.]

**00:22-00:27**
You know the rules and so do I.
[VISUAL: The scene shifts to daytime. Astley, now in a light blue denim shirt and jeans, dances near a chain-link fence.]

**00:27-00:31**
A full commitment's what I'm thinking of.
[VISUAL: A shadow of a person is cast on the ground, striking a pose.]

**00:31-00:35**
You wouldn't get this from any other guy.
[VISUAL: The scene returns to the daytime shot of Astley by the fence.]

**00:35-00:39**
I just wanna tell you how I'm feeling.
[VISUAL: The scene switches back to the nighttime alley. Astley sings directly to the camera.]

**00:39-00:43**
Gotta make you understand.
[VISUAL: Astley, in his denim outfit, makes a "listen" gesture with his hands.]

**00:43-00:48**
Never gonna give you up, never gonna let you down.
[VISUAL: Astley sings into the vintage microphone, wearing a black blazer over a striped shirt. A large, ornate window is behind him.]

**00:48-00:52**
Never gonna run around and desert you.
[VISUAL: Astley and two female dancers perform choreography on a small stage in a large hall with the ornate window in the background.]

**00:52-00:56**
Never gonna make you cry, never gonna say goodbye.
[VISUAL: A bartender in a white shirt and red suspenders wipes down a bar, then looks up with a start. The scene cuts back to the stage performance.]

**00:56-01:00**
Never gonna tell a lie and hurt you.
[VISUAL: Close-up of Astley singing into the microphone.]

**01:00-01:05**
We've known each other for so long.
[VISUAL: Astley sings in the nighttime alley scene.]
*   **TEMPORAL CONTEXT:** The lyric "for so long" establishes a past relationship of significant, albeit undefined, duration.

**01:05-01:09**
Your heart's been aching but you're too shy to say it.
[VISUAL: The nighttime alley scene continues.]

**01:09-01:13**
Inside we both know what's been going on.
[VISUAL: Close-up of Astley's face as he sings.]

**01:13-01:18**
We know the game and we're gonna play it.
[VISUAL: The bartender throws a glass in the air and catches it. The scene cuts to Astley and the dancers on stage.]

**01:18-01:22**
And if you ask me how I'm feeling,
[VISUAL: The bartender dances behind the bar. The scene cuts to a close-up of Astley singing.]

**01:22-01:26**
Don't tell me you're too blind to see.
[VISUAL: Astley gestures from the nighttime alley.]

**01:26-01:30**
Never gonna give you up, never gonna let you down.
[VISUAL: The chorus repeats with Astley singing into the microphone.]

**01:30-01:34**
Never gonna run around and desert you.
[VISUAL: Astley and the dancers perform on the stage in the hall.]

**01:34-01:38**
Never gonna make you cry, never gonna say goodbye.
[VISUAL: The bartender dances behind the bar. The scene cuts to Astley and the dancers on stage, now with him in the center and the dancers on either side of him.]

**01:38-01:43**
Never gonna tell a lie and hurt you.
[VISUAL: The bartender performs a backflip over the bar counter.]

**01:43-01:47**
Never gonna give you up, never gonna let you down.
[VISUAL: A close-up of Astley's smiling face.]

**01:47-01:51**
Never gonna run around and desert you.
[VISUAL: The blonde woman dances in front of the patterned window.]

**01:51-01:55**
Never gonna make you cry, never gonna say goodbye.
[VISUAL: The daytime scene shows the blonde woman dancing in front of a white brick wall.]

**01:55-02:02**
Never gonna tell a lie and hurt you.
[VISUAL: A man in a white t-shirt and jeans walks past the white brick wall.]

**02:02-02:09**
(Ooh give you up). (Ooh give you up). (Give you up).
[VISUAL: Instrumental section with repeated vocal hooks. The bartender dances in the nighttime alley. A dancer in a striped shirt performs acrobatic moves against the chain-link fence.]

**02:09-02:16**
(Give you up). Never gonna give, never gonna give. (Give you up).
[VISUAL: The shadow of a person dances on the ground. Astley dances by the fence.]

**02:16-02:20**
We've known each other for so long.
[VISUAL: Astley performs on the stage in the hall.]
*   **TEMPORAL CONTEXT:** Repetition of the lyric "for so long," reinforcing the history between the singer and the subject.

**02:20-02:25**
Your heart's been aching but you're too shy to say it.
[VISUAL: Astley sings into the vintage microphone, unbuttoning his blazer.]

**02:25-02:29**
Inside we both know what's been going on.
[VISUAL: Close-up of Astley singing in the nighttime alley.]

**02:29-02:33**
We know the game and we're gonna play it.
[VISUAL: Astley dances in the nighttime alley.]

**02:33-02:37**
I just wanna tell you how I'm feeling.
[VISUAL: The nighttime alley scene continues.]

**02:37-02:42**
Gotta make you understand.
[VISUAL: A male dancer performs acrobatics and breakdancing moves in the nighttime alley.]

**02:42-02:46**
Never gonna give you up, never gonna let you down.
[VISUAL: Astley sings in the nighttime alley.]

**02:46-02:50**
Never gonna run around and desert you.
[VISUAL: A male dancer performs a back handspring in the nighttime alley.]

**02:50-02:54**
Never gonna make you cry, never gonna say goodbye.
[VISUAL: Close-up of Astley's face as he sings and smiles.]

**02:54-02:58**
Never gonna tell a lie and hurt you.
[VISUAL: The male dancer continues his acrobatic dance routine in the alley.]

**02:58-03:02**
Never gonna give you up, never gonna let you down.
[VISUAL: Astley sings into the microphone in the hall.]

**03:02-03:07**
Never gonna run around and desert you.
[VISUAL: The bartender dances again. The scene cuts to Astley and the dancers on stage.]

**03:07-03:11**
Never gonna make you cry, never gonna say goodbye.
[VISUAL: Close-up of Astley singing.]

**03:11-03:15**
Never gonna tell a lie and hurt you.
[VISUAL: Astley and a dancer perform choreography in the hall.]

**03:15-03:19**
Never gonna give you up, never gonna let you down.
[VISUAL: Astley sings in the nighttime alley.]

**03:19-03:23**
Never gonna run around and desert you.
[VISUAL: Astley sings into the microphone.]

**03:23-03:32**
Never gonna make you cry, never gonna say goodbye. Never gonna tell a lie and hurt you.
[VISUAL: The video ends with a final shot of Astley singing in the nighttime alley, which then fades to black.]

**VISUAL TEMPORAL CUES**

*   **Time of Day:** The video clearly alternates between two distinct times of day.
    *   **Daytime:** Scenes featuring Rick Astley in a denim outfit and a blonde woman dancing are shot during the day, indicated by bright, natural light and shadows. These scenes take place outdoors near a chain-link fence and a white brick wall.
    *   **Nighttime:** Scenes featuring Rick Astley in a trench coat and a male dancer performing acrobatics are shot at night. This is indicated by the dark background, artificial street lighting, and the overall blue color grading typical of night shots.
*   **Time Period:** The fashion (hairstyles, high-waisted jeans, blazer with rolled-up sleeves), dance styles (including breakdancing elements), and video production quality (color palette, soft focus) strongly place the video in the late **1980s**. The song was released in **1987**, and the visual aesthetic is a clear temporal marker of that era.
*   **Chronological Sequence:** The video does not present a linear chronological narrative. Instead, it intercuts between different performance settings (day, night, indoor stage, bar) to match the rhythm and energy of the song. The sequence is stylistic rather than narrative.

**VISUAL DATE EXTRACTION**

*   There are **no specific dates, years, or times** (e.g., from clocks, calendars, or on-screen text) visible anywhere in the video content provided. A thorough frame-by-frame review confirms the absence of explicit numerical date markers.

key_points.text: The singer makes six core promises of loyalty: never gonna give you up, let you down, run around and desert you, make you cry, say goodbye, or tell a lie and hurt you.
The song's lyrical theme is a direct declaration of unwavering romantic commitment and an attempt to establish trust.
The video's visual aesthetic (fashion, soft focus, dance styles) and the song's release date firmly establish its time period as the late 1980s, specifically 1987.
A pre-existing relationship of significant duration is established through the lyric 'We've known each other for so long.'
The video's narrative is non-linear, intercutting between distinct settings and times of day to match the song's rhythm.
Two distinct times of day are visually represented: bright, naturally lit daytime scenes and dark, artificially lit nighttime scenes.
The subject of the song is characterized as having an 'aching heart' but being 'too shy to say it'.
The singer asserts his unique value, claiming his level of commitment cannot be obtained from 'any other guy'.
A mutual, unspoken understanding exists between the singer and the subject, as 'Inside we both know what's been going on'.
The video features multiple personnel: Rick Astley, an acrobatic bartender, a male breakdancer, a lead female dancer, and two backup dancers.
Daytime scenes feature Rick Astley in a denim outfit, primarily near a chain-link fence and brick wall.
Nighttime scenes feature Rick Astley in a trench coat, primarily in a brick alleyway.
The bartender character performs advanced acrobatics, including a backflip over the bar.
A male dancer performs breakdancing and other acrobatic moves in the nighttime alley setting.
Key performance locations include an indoor hall with a stage, a bar, an outdoor area by a fence, and a nighttime alley.
Rick Astley frequently sings directly to the camera, creating a sense of personal address to the audience or subject.
The singer states that a 'full commitment's what I'm thinking of', indicating his future intentions.
A shared understanding of relationship 'rules' is claimed to exist between the singer and the subject.
Astley's wardrobe includes multiple distinct outfits: a trench coat over a turtleneck, a full denim outfit, and a black blazer with a striped shirt.
A vintage-style microphone is a key prop used during the indoor performance hall scenes.
Choreographed dance sequences are a major component of the video, performed on stage and in other locations.
No explicit numerical dates, clocks, or calendars are visible anywhere in the video frames.
Promise: The singer will never 'give you up'.
Promise: The singer will never 'let you down'.
Promise: The singer will never 'run around and desert you'.
Promise: The singer will never 'make you cry'.
Promise: The singer will never 'say goodbye'.
Promise: The singer will never 'tell a lie and hurt you'.
The parties involved are established as 'no strangers to love'.
The singer's stated goal is to 'make you understand' his feelings.
The video concludes with a final shot of the singer in the nighttime alley before fading to black.
Stylistic use of shadow is employed, including a shot of a person's shadow striking a pose.

summary:
This intelligence briefing analyzes the lyrics and visual content of Rick Astley's 1987 music video, "Never Gonna Give You Up." The primary lyrical theme is a direct and emphatic declaration of unwavering loyalty and romantic commitment to an unnamed subject. The singer, Rick Astley, makes a series of six core promises (e.g., "never gonna give you up," "never gonna let you down") that form the song's chorus and central message. The lyrics establish a pre-existing relationship of significant but undefined length ("We've known each other for so long") and suggest the subject has past emotional pain, positioning the singer as a uniquely reliable and trustworthy partner.

The visual narrative is non-linear and stylistic, intercutting between several distinct locations and times of day to maintain a dynamic pace. Key settings include an indoor performance hall, a bar, an outdoor area near a chain-link fence, and a nighttime brick alley. The video features several performers in addition to Astley: an acrobatic bartender, a male breakdancer, and multiple female dancers. Astley himself appears in several outfits iconic to the era, including a trench coat and a full denim ensemble, frequently addressing the camera directly to reinforce the personal nature of the song's message.

Temporally, the analysis identifies two key layers. The first is the lyrical timeline, which references a long past relationship leading to a present declaration and a future of commitment. The second is the visual timeline, which clearly demarcates between daytime and nighttime scenes through lighting and color grading. More broadly, the video's fashion, hairstyles, soft-focus cinematography, and dance styles serve as definitive temporal markers, placing the production firmly in the late 1980s. This is corroborated by the song's known release date of 1987. No explicit numerical dates or times are visually present within the video itself.
